name: Roko Lulu And A Witch
description:
This is an Rpg Maker horror adventure, fake action rpg game. 

Twins Roko and Lulu have been kidnapped by a witch who plans on eating them for dinner. Set free by one of the witch's past victims the twins must be stealthy, solve minor puzzles, and fight monsters, if they wish to escape the witch's lair before dinner!
